meanings.definition: To cancel or delete by drawing a line through
meanings.sent1: I will strikeover the incorrect answer on my paper.
meanings.sent2: Please strikeover any items on the list that are no longer needed.
meanings.sent3: The teacher had to strikeover the mistake on the whiteboard.
meanings.sent4: She decided to strikeover her previous plans and start fresh.
meanings.sent5: The red pen will strikeover the errors in the document.

meanings.definition: A line drawn through something to indicate deletion or cancellation
meanings.sent1: The strikeover on the document showed which sections were removed.
meanings.sent2: She used a strikeover to mark the items that were out of stock.
meanings.sent3: The strikeover on the map made it look like a maze.
meanings.sent4: The strikeover in the contract indicated the changes made.
meanings.sent5: The strikeover in the text made it hard to read the original message.
